skillTree.localised_description: Dark Elf Beastmasters roam the wilds atop their dreaded chariots, armed with barbed nets and harpoons to slay the foe and ensnare their prey.
The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.
There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: This one has adopted a warrior name to strike fear into enemy hearts, a moniker backed up by their deeds in battle.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Characters's own combat skills

skillTree.localised_description: This one's chosen name is muttered in hushed tones, reflecting as it does their vile proclivities.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Lord's army

skillTree.localised_description: Some family names are best forgotten; others are worthy of resurrection, as they engender fear and respect among the masses.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that influences the province in which Lord is standing or the faction as a whole

skillTree.localised_description: The strength and willpower required to break in the extremely stubborn Cold One reptiles as war steeds is innately abundant in most High Beastmasters.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The wrangling of the wrathful Bloodwrack Medusae directly from their squalid subterranean lairs is not a job for the faint-hearted.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +12% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The most colossal monsters of land and sea are prizes beyond treasures to the Beastmaster, requiring colossal empathy to control.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Since Sulekh’s death, her children continue to fight in the Beastmasters’ ranks in the name of vengeance for their fallen ancestor.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Black Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Black Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It matters not the nature of the beast; eventually, all submit to the Beastmaster’s will or perish under his lash.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for monstrous units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for monstrous units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Beastmasters share their minions’ belligerence, cutting down foemen with lash, spear, and harpoon before claiming their twitching bodies as fodder.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units

Melee defence: +8 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.
Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.
When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -40% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
"Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.
Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
